name: Hegic
description: Hegic is an on-chain decentralized peer-to-pool options trading protocol. Users can trade American, cash-settled wBTC and ETH call/put options 24/7.

en.name: Hegic
en.description: Hegic is an on-chain decentralized peer-to-pool options trading protocol. Users can trade American, cash-settled wBTC and ETH call/put options 24/7.

fr.name: Hegic
fr.description: Hegic est un protocole décentralisé de trading d'options peer-to-pool on-chain. Les utilisateurs peuvent échanger des options d'achat/vente de wBTC et ETH américaines, réglées en espèces 24h/24 et 7j/7.

es.name: Hegic
es.description: Hegic es un protocolo de comercio de opciones peer-to-pool descentralizado. Los usuarios pueden negociar opciones americanas de compra/venta de wBTC y ETH liquidadas en efectivo las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana.

de.name: Hegic
de.description: Hegic is an on-chain decentralized peer-to-pool options trading protocol. Users can trade American, cash-settled wBTC and ETH call/put options 24/7.

pt.name: Hegic
pt.description: Hegic é um protocolo de negociações de opções entre usuários e pools, descentralizado e implantado no blockchain. Usuários podem negociar 24/7 opções de compra e venda de wBTC e ETH, dos tipos Americana, com liquidação em dinheiro.

el.name: Hegic
el.description: Hegic is an on-chain decentralized peer-to-pool options trading protocol. Users can trade American, cash-settled wBTC and ETH call/put options 24/7.

tr.name: Hegic
tr.description: Hegic, zincir üzerinde merkezi olmayan bir eşler arası havuz opsiyon ticareti protokolüdür. Kullanıcılar, Amerikan, nakit ödemeli wBTC ve ETH alım/satım opsiyonlarını 7/24 takas edebilir.

vi.description: Hegic is an on-chain decentralized peer-to-pool options trading protocol. Users can trade American, cash-settled wBTC and ETH call/put options 24/7.

ja.name: Hegic
ja.description: Hegicはオンチェーンの分散型ピアツープールオプション取引プロトコルです。ユーザーはアメリカの、現金決済のwBTCとETHのコール/プットオプションを24時間365日取引することができます。
